haReport:
This mission was flown by:
Kmdr Lambrecht Steinberg
Obltn Patrik Schorner

 The mission was flown from Bonneuil Ferme aerodrome.

Successes include the following: 
On 18/05/1916 near Puisieux.
A Nieuport 11.C1 of Esc N.62 was brought down by Mario Falck of Jasta 4.
Lt Jean-Baptiste Frahier was killed in action.
Mario Falck was  flying a Fokker E.III.

On 18/05/1916 near Guiscard.
A F.E.2b of Esc 8 was brought down by Patrik Schorner of Jasta 4.
Marceau Astruc was killed in action.
Ignace Bretons was not injured.
Patrik Schorner was  flying a Fokker E.III.

On 18/05/1916 near Beaumont.
A Nieuport 11.C1 of Esc N.65 was brought down by Siegfried Ganzfried of Jasta 4.
Lt Richard Berlier was killed in action.
Siegfried Ganzfried was  flying a Fokker E.III.
narrative: A bounce from high altitude on low flying pushers.  I attach myself to one and bring him down.  Very routine but very satisfying.
